Subsection.Text: The department shall develop a publicly available substance abuse prevention Internet website. The information on the Internet website shall target youth and their parents, teachers, and other stakeholders.
The Internet website shall incorporate, at a minimum, the following components;

Paragraph.Text: The nature of Florida’s current youth alcohol, tobacco, and other drug use concerns;
The health, social, and legal effects of alcohol, tobacco, and other drug use on individuals, families, schools, and the economy;
National, state, and local substance abuse prevention and treatment resources; and

Classroom, home, and individual instructional activities and games geared to teach targeted youth about the harmful effects of alcohol, tobacco, or other drug use, refusal and other prevention skills, and how to get help for someone using drugs.
